channel.title: Need help, ill make you a admin
channel.description:
I need help fixing my teleports on my server, if you help me ill make you a admin and give you rep..
please message me, zorronux@hotmail.com
thanks

item.title: Need help, ill make you a admin
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Jp Owner Jp
item.description:
@Owner_Jp wrote:

[quote=“arsenal94, post:6, topic:200075”][quote author=Mary|Jane link=topic=264728.msg2188428#msg2188428 date=1208258111]
Well considering you can’t give rep, or make a admin on a server; because if you can’t fix teleports i’m suprised that you even know how to open up a char folder.
[/quote]
Mary this is the help section. Not the “Lets all be wannabe Dicks and mods section.” -.-[/quote]

Lol.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2008, 05:51:19 AM[/size][hr]First off, There is no case 13035 in my files, Wth? Nor any teles o.O I’ll just create a new one :p[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2008, 05:54:38 AM[/size][hr][quote=“Busta Blader, post:4, topic:200075”]case 13035:
{
teleX = xxxx;
teleX = xxxx;
}
break;[/quote]
Shouldn’t that be:

teleX = xxxx; teleY = xxxx; } break; [br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2008, 05:56:11 AM[/size][hr]And that doesn’t work

Read full topic

item.title: Need help, ill make you a admin
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Jp Owner Jp
item.description:
@Owner_Jp wrote:

[quote=“kexion, post:3, topic:200075”]i know alot, its just that i cant seem to figure out why it wont let me teleport, i cant find anything relating to the teleport name, i know alot but this just got my stumped. so please help me, thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2008, 12:30:08 AM[/size][hr]i tried to do something like this

the button id for the teleport, was 13035,

i did this

case 13035:
if (teleblock == true) { // Made by Jp
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”);
} else {
customCommand(“home”); // made by Jp
}
break;

but that didnt work… hmmm anyone else have any ideas to make the teleports on the spell book work?[/quote]

Leeching ftw?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help, ill make you a admin
item.dc:creator: @kexion kexion
item.description:
@kexion wrote:

i know alot, its just that i cant seem to figure out why it wont let me teleport, i cant find anything relating to the teleport name, i know alot but this just got my stumped. so please help me, thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2008, 12:30:08 AM[/size][hr]i tried to do something like this

the button id for the teleport, was 13035,

i did this

case 13035:
if (teleblock == true) { // Made by Jp
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”);
} else {
customCommand(“home”); // made by Jp
}
break;

but that didnt work… hmmm anyone else have any ideas to make the teleports on the spell book work?

Read full topic
